ValidationRule.description: If a PLP record is related to the RFP Request, then the PLP record must be approved before setting the RFP Status to "Closed - Won".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNULL( PLP_Name__c )), PLP_Status__c = "Review" || PLP_Status__c = "Rejected", ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Closed - Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If you have a related PLP Record, the status must be "Approved" before closing this RFP Request as "Closed - Won".
